text: William Francis "Smoke" Herring (October 31, 1893 - September 10, 1962) was a Major League Baseball pitcher. He pitched in three games for the Brooklyn Tip- Tops of the Federal League in 1915. ==Sources== ==External links== * Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Brooklyn Tip-Tops players Category:Worcester Busters players Category:Bridgeport Americans players Category:Albany Senators players Category:Baseball players from New York (state) Category:1893 births Category:1962 deaths
title: Bill Herring
